name: Aquarius
description:
Aquarius is the 11th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Friendliness, Eccentricity, Teamwork, Humanitarianism, Technology, Futuristic, Groups.

Positive Qualities: Friendly, Humanitarian, Intelligent, Creative, Independent, Loyal.

Negative Qualities: Unpredictable, Inconsistent, Detached, Stubborn, Aloof, Extremist.

name: Aries
description:
Aries is the 1st sign of the Zodiac

Represents: Willpower, Initiative, Determination, Passion, Beginnings, Self-Belief, Innocence

Positive Qualities: Adventurous, Courageous, Versatile, Lively, Positive, Passionate

Negative Qualities: Arrogant, Stubborn, Impulsive, Indiscipline, Confrontational

name: Cancer
description:
Cancer is the 4th sign of the Zodaic.

Represents: Nurturing, Sensitivity, Emotions, Moodiness, Home, Family, Children, Femininity

Positive Qualities: Creative, Spontaneous, Faithful, Loving, Protective, Emotional

Negative Qualities: Moody, Pessimistic, Clingy, Overemotional, Suspicious

name: Capricorn
description:
Capricorn is the 10th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Ambition, Structure, Goals, Long-Term Plans, Prestige, Public Image/Acclaim

Positive Qualities: Practical, Ambitious, Wise, Disciplined, Patient, Cautious

Negative Qualities: Pessimistic, Stubborn, Shy.

name: Gemini
description:
Gemini is the 3rd sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Communication, Collaboration, Synergy, Cleverness, Wittiness, Inventiveness, Ingenuity

Positive Qualities Flexible, Versatile, Enthusiastic, Soft-Spoken, Witty, Intellectual

Negative Qualities: Inconsistent, Superficial, Indecisive, Directionless, Anxious

name: Leo
description:
Leo is the 5th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Passion, Romance, Expression, Drama, Playfulness, Courageous, Loyal

Positive Qualities: Kind, Helpful, Energetic, Optimistic, Straightforward, Loyal

Negative Qualities: Headstrong, Egoistic, Possessive, Dominating, Impatient, Arrogant

name: Libra
description:
Libra is the 7th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents:Commitment, Partnership, Equality, Balance, Mutuality, Fairness

Positive Qualities: Tactful, Romantic, Charming, Just, Diplomatic

Negative Qualities: Superficial, Detached, Unreliable, Lazy, Indecisive

name: Pisces
description:
Pisces is the 12th sign of the Zodiac

Represents: Dreams, Fantasy, Healing, Compassion, Karma, Mystery

Positive Qualities: Imaginative, Kind, Compassionate, Intuitive, Sensitive, Selfless

Negative Qualities: Escapist, Idealistic, Over-Sensitive, Pessimistic, Lazy

name: Saggitarius
description:
Saggitarius is the 9th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Adventure, Travel, Expansion, Honesty, Outspokenness, Wisdom

Positive Qualities: Straightforward, Intellectual, Philosophical, Kind-Hearted

Negative Qualities: Careless, Tactless, Impatient, Inconsistent, Over Confident

name: Scorpio
description:
Scorpio is the 8th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Intimacy, Sex, Secrecy, Power, Intensity, Obsession

Positive Qualities: Focused, Brave, Balanced, Faithful, Ambitious, Intuitive

Negative Qualities: Jealous, Secretive, Resentful, Manipulative.

name: Taurus
description:
Taurus is the 2nd sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Stability, Security, Elegance, Sensuality, Stubbornness, Persistence

Positive Qualities: Generous, Dependable, Down to Earth, PAtient, Independent, Persistent

Negative Qualities: Stubborn, Self-indulgent, Lazy, Materialistic, Possessive

name: Virgo
description:
Virgo is the 6th sign of the Zodiac.

Represents: Health, Helpfulness, Order, Organization, Innocence, Purity

Positive Qualities: Vigilant, Intelligent, Practical, Analytical, Reliable, Trustworthy, Modest, Perfectionist

Negative Qualities: Overcritical, Fussy, Fastidious, Harsh, Conservative, Judgemental.

name: Blue
description:
Blue is the Throat Chakra, known as Vishuddha

Represents:Communication, Expression

name: Green
description:
Green is the Heart Chakra, known as Anahat

Represents: Love, Compassion, Empathy

name: Indigo
description:
Indigo is the Third Eye Chakra, known as Ajnaa

Represents: Intuition

name: Orange
description:
Orange is the Sacral Chakra, known as Svadhishthana.

Represents:Connections, Pleasure, Creative Energy

name: Red
description:
Red is the Root Chakra, known as Muladhara.

Represents: Survival, Instinct, Safety, Grounding

name: Violet
description:
Violet is the Crown Chakra, known as Sahasrara.

Represents: Spirituality, Connection with Higher Powers, Balance

name: Yellow
description:
Yellow is the Solar Plexus Chakra, known as

Represents: Emotions, Confidence, Control

name: Luna
description: Luna is the Artist. It represents the Moon, the element of Water as well as the aspects of Love, Emotions, Femininity (Yin), Creativity and Imagination.

name: Mercurius
description: Mercurius is the Messenger. It represents the planet Mercury, the elemental of Air as well as the aspects of Knowledge, Change, Action, the Mind and Intellect or Philosophy.

name: Sol
description: Sol is the Ruler. It represents our Sun, the element of Fire as well as the aspects of Passion, Willpower, Ambition, Masculinity (yang), Ego, Meaning and Spirituality and matters of Justice or Law.

name: Terra
description: Terra is the Warrior, it is the Mother Earth we inhabit, it embodies the element of Earth and material matters, and the aspects of life including Wealth and Finances, Practicality and Work/Career.

name: Serpent
description: The Serpent is a special card. When it appears, it means there is an opportunity, decision or knowledge to be gained. That knowledge may come at a cost, it may be very tempting and ulterior motives may be involved. Be wary of the Serpent, but do not be afraid. It also represents change and growth.
